scenario_text.value:
Being lured to a run-down place like this
makes me feel like dirt.

Traces of humans living here... I get it, it
feels a bit suffocating in here.

Just like the shopping district, it’s a tad
more out of date than things in our world.

You think these dolls mean a girl lived here
or something?

Once I start imagining what kind of humans
lived here, I can’t bring myself to stop.

(Labramon seems kinda down. A room like this
would hardly life anyone’s spirits.)

Aoi and I will search this place. Please go
check out another spot.
